meanings.definition: The act of passing a thread through the eye of a needle.
meanings.sent1: She struggled with the threading of the needle.
meanings.sent2: The threading of the needle required precision.
meanings.sent3: The threading of the needle became a daily challenge for her.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was tested by the threading of the needle.
meanings.sent5: The threading of the needle demanded steady hands.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging a series of objects in a line or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The threading of the beads on the string was meticulous.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the threading of the beads to create a bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The threading of the beads turned into a fun craft project.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in threading the beads amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The threading of the beads resulted in a beautiful necklace.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a continuous path or pattern through something.
meanings.sent1: The threading of the maze was challenging.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planned the threading of the maze.
meanings.sent3: The threading of the maze led to unexpected twists.
meanings.sent4: His strategy for threading the maze was clever.
meanings.sent5: The threading of the maze required strategic thinking.
